verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
For Thou, O Lord, art high above the earth;
Thou art exalted far above all gods.
For Thou, O Lord, art high above the earth,
Thou art exalted far above all gods.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I exalt Thee, I exalt Thee, I exalt Thee, O Lord;
I exalt Thee, I exalt Thee, I exalt Thee, O Lord.
